1.name: Default
1.description: Lexington-class aircraft carrier - Saratoga, Hull Number CV-3!

2.name: Retrofit
2.description: Sister Sara's leaving the nest and going down a new path! I'm making my official debut as the magical girl idol Saratoga! I'm leaving all the advertising to you, Commander~

3.name: Ocean Holidays
3.description: Even if we don't get to relax on holiday, it's always good to have a swimsuit! Ok, let's go! Are you ready to swim?

limitBreak.tier2: Hangar Capacity +1, All Dive Bombers +1, Fighter Efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier3: All Diver Bombers +1, Diver Bomber Efficiency +7%

1.name: Supporting Fire
1.description: Every 20 (10) seconds, provides supporting fire with 20.3 cm guns (damage varies with skill level)

2.name: Fleet Carrier
2.description: Every time Saratoga launches an airstrike, increases Escort Fleet damage by 5% (15%) for 8 seconds. Does not stack with the same skill.

3.name: Magical Girl's Prank
3.description: When Saratoga launches an airstrike: 40% (70%) chance to launch additional planes (damage based on skill level) that inflict flood and burn damage on hit.

1.chinese: 列克星敦级航空母舰—萨拉托加，舷号CV-3
1.chineseTL: Lexington-class aircraft carrier - Saratoga, Hull Number CV-3
1.japanese: レキシントン級航空母艦・サラトガ（CV-3)
1.english: Lexington-class aircraft carrier — Saratoga, Hull Number CV-3

2.chinese: 我是航空母舰，列克星敦！的妹妹萨拉托加。嗯……喜欢的事情是恶作剧！啊不过指挥官已经知道了吧。真正的航空战术先驱吗……要是姐姐没有走的那么早，那一定是姐姐的称号吧
2.chineseTL: I am the aircraft carrier Lexington's (!) little sister, Saratoga. Yes... I love pranks! Ah, but Commander already knew that, right? The true pioneer of aviation tactics... if my sister hadn't passed so early, that title would've definitely been hers.
2.japanese: 私は航空母艦・レキシントン～の、妹サラトガ！うん……好きなことはいたずらすること！でも指揮官にはもうバレちゃったね～航空戦術の先導者？お姉ちゃんが先にいなくなってなかったら、きっとお姉ちゃんにあげるべきだったよね…
2.japaneseTL: I'm the Lexington Aircraft Carrier… 's little sister, Saratoga! Hm… my favorite thing to do is playing pranks! But you already figured that out, Commander~ The pioneer of aviation tactics? If only my sister hadn't passed away first, she'd definitely had been given that title…
2.english: I am aircraft carrier Lexington's little sister, Saratoga! Hmm... I like to play pranks! But you already knew that, Commander~ Pioneer of aviation tactics? If my sister hadn't passed away so soon, that title would've definitely been hers.

3.chinese: yo~指挥官你好！我是列克星敦——的妹妹萨拉托加~……如果没什么重要的事的话，我就先走了哦
3.chineseTL: Yo~ Hello Commander! I am Lexington's—— little sister Saratoga~ ...If there is nothing important for me, I'll be going first then.
3.japanese: やあ、指揮官こんにちは！私がレキシントン…の妹のサラトガだよ～特に用事がないんだったらもう行くね
3.japaneseTL: Hey, good day, Commander! I'm Lexington… 's little sister, Saratoga~ If you don't really have anything for me to do then I'll get going.
3.english: Hey there, and good day, Commander! I am Lexington...'s little sister, Saratoga~ If there's nothing important, I'm leaving now

4.chinese: 咻~！啊，指挥官，不好意思，我不是故意对着你放飞机的，欸嘿~
4.chineseTL: Hey~! Ah, Commander, my apologies. I didn't mean to launch planes at you, oops~
4.japanese: あらら～指揮官ごめんね、わざとそっちに向けて艦載機を飛ばしたんじゃないんだよ～
4.japaneseTL: Oh whoops~ Sorry, Commander. I wasn't trying to launch planes in your direction on purpose~
4.english: Oh my~ Sorry Commander. I didn't mean to launch planes at you on purpose~

5.chinese: 你再偷看奇怪地方的话，连小学生都不会把你当恋人
5.chineseTL: If you keep peeking at weird places, even primary school students wouldn't take you as a lover.
5.japanese: 変なところを盗み見すると、小学生にも相手にしてもらえないわよ♪
5.japaneseTL: If you try sneaking a peak in the wrong places, not even a grade schooler will keep you company♪
5.english: If you keep on peeping where you shouldn't, even kids will not be talking to you~

6.chinese: 哇！——嘻嘻，吓吓你~指挥官反应好迟钝呀！?
6.chineseTL: Wah! ——Hehe, just scaring you~ Commander has such slow reflexes huh!?
6.japanese: わ！うふふ、びっくりした？指揮官って反応が遅いのね！？
6.japaneseTL: Boo! (Giggle) Did I scare you? You're slow to react, aren't you?!
6.english: Boo! Hehe, did I susprise you? Commander, you're slow, aren't you?!

7.chinese: 指挥官不要把萨拉托加和姐姐认错哦！
7.chineseTL: Commander, do not mistake Saratoga and her sister for each other, okay!
7.japanese: 指揮官、私とお姉ちゃんを間違えないでよ！
7.japaneseTL: Don't get me and my sister mixed up!
7.english: Commander, don't confuse me with my big sister!

8.chinese: 哈？要我叫你“欧尼酱”？这是绝对不可能的事哦~
8.chineseTL: Huh? You want me to call you 'Onii-chan'? That is something that would definitely not happen~
8.japanese: え？「お兄ちゃん」って呼んでって？それはないでしょ～
8.japaneseTL: Huh? You want me to call you "big brother"? You're kidding me, right~
8.english: Eh? Call you 'big bro'? There's no way that's happening~

9.chinese: 虽然我个子小，但我可是有好好的发育的！
9.chineseTL: My body may be small, but I'm still developing!
9.japanese: 背は低いけど、ちゃんと成長してるんだよ！
9.japaneseTL: I might be short, but I really am getting bigger!
9.english: My stature may be small, but I've yet to grow past that fact!

11.chinese: 指挥官啊，这么点任务你都不做完呀？
11.chineseTL: Commander, you won't even complete this small amount of tasks?
11.japanese: 指揮官、こんな任務もできないの？
11.japaneseTL: You can't even complete a task like this?
11.english: Commander, can't you complete even a mission?

12.chinese: 指挥官，大事不好了，任务奖励不见了！欸嘿，露馅了吗~
12.chineseTL: Commander, it's terrible. The mission rewards are gone! Hehe, was I exposed already~
12.japanese: 大変だよ指揮官、ミッションボーナスがなくなっちゃったよ！……ちぇ、バレちゃったか
12.japaneseTL: Something awful happened, Commander! The mission bonus is all gone! Tsk, you figured out it was me.
12.english: This is bad, Commander! The mission rewards are missing! --Darn, you caught me.

13.chinese: 有新邮件你不看吗？——不然我看了哦？
13.chineseTL: You're not going to read the new mail? ——Else I'm going to read it, alright?
13.japanese: メール見ないの？……じゃあ私が見るよ？
13.japaneseTL: Aren't you gonna read your mail? Should I read it for you then?
13.english: You didn't see the mail? --Then should I read it?

15.chinese: 指挥官，我丢在港口巡逻的孩子说委托组的姐妹们回来了喔~
15.chineseTL: Commander, the children that I dropped off to patrol at the port says that the girls on commission have returned~
15.japanese: 指揮官、パトロールしに行った艦載機たちから、委託に出た娘たちが帰ってきたって～
15.japaneseTL: Commander, the planes I sent on a patrol told me the girls you sent out on a commission are back~
15.english: Commander, my patrol planes told me the girls out for commission have returned~

16.japanese: サラトガちゃん、あなたがダイスキだよ～♪

17.chinese: 前天是小龙骧，昨天是小千岁，今天就是你们了~上吧！
17.chineseTL: The day before yesterday was little Ryuujou, yesterday was little Chitose, and today is you~ let's go!
17.japanese: 一昨日は龍驤ちゃん、昨日は千歳ちゃん、今日はあなたたちね～行くよ！
17.japaneseTL: Two days ago I sunk Ryuujou, yesterday I sunk Chitose, and today you guys~ Here I come!
17.english: Two days ago it was Ryuujou, yesterday it was Chitose, and today it's you all. Let's go!

18.chinese: 欸嘿嘿~姐姐太忙了，偶尔让我客串下不挺好的嘛~
18.chineseTL: Ehehe~ Big sis is too busy. Once in a while, a guest appearance by me isn't too bad right~
18.japanese: あらら～お姉ちゃんが忙しいから、たまには私が出てきてもいいよね～
18.japaneseTL: Oh my~ Lexington is too busy right now, so surely you don't mind if I pop in sometimes~
18.english: Ooh la la~ Big sis is busy, so it's fine that I get to come by once a while~

19.chinese: 欸嘿，可以趁回家维修的时候好好休息一下了~
19.chineseTL: Ehe, I can get a good rest while being repaired at home~
19.japanese: あちゃ～、かえって修理するから、ついでにゆっくり休むよ～
19.japaneseTL: Dang it! Since I'll need repairs when I get back, I'll take the opportunity to rest as well~
19.english: Oh dang~ I'll go back for repairs, and then have a good rest while I'm at it~

20.chineseTL: Where are you looking, I'm over here~
20.japanese: どこ見てるの？こっちだよ～
20.japaneseTL: What are you looking at? I'm over here~
20.english: Where are you looking? I'm right over here~

21.japaneseTL: Oh no! I'm in big trouble!

22.chinese: 恶作剧？已经不会对指挥官做了哦，因为没有兴致了
22.chineseTL: Pranks? I won't play pranks on Commander anymore, since I've lost interest.
22.japanese: いたずら？もう指揮官にはしないよ？ノリが悪いからね
22.japaneseTL: My pranks? I won't do them to you anymore, Commander. Since you can't take a joke.
22.english: Pranks? I already stopped pulling them on you~ You're no fun for those

23.japanese: 今日は～誰に～しよう～かな～♪

24.chinese: 指挥官，萨拉妹妹和她的姐姐最大的差别是什么呢~答案就是萨拉妹妹今天的颜色哦~
24.chineseTL: Commander, what is the biggest difference between little Saratoga and her big sister~? The answer is little Saratoga's color for today~!
24.japanese: 指揮官、サラトガちゃんとお姉ちゃんの一番大きな違いってなんだと思う～？答えは、サラトガちゃんの今日の色、だよ～
24.japaneseTL: Commander, what do you think the biggest difference is between me and my sister~? The answer: the color I'm wearing today~
24.english: Commander, what's the greatest difference between me and my big sister? The answer, is my 'color' today!

25.chinese: 指挥官，萨拉妹妹有重要的事告诉你，写在你手心里喔~……（笨……蛋）你以为我会写喜欢吗~笨蛋指挥官~
25.chineseTL: Commander, little Saratoga has something very important to tell you. Let me write it on your palm~... (Id...iot) Did you think that I was going to write "I like you"~ Idiot Commander~
25.japanese: 指揮官、サラトガちゃんからオハナシがあるの。手のひらに書いて～っと……好きって書くと思った？バカ指揮官～
25.japaneseTL: Commander, I have something to tell you. I'll write it in the palm of your hand~… You thought I was gonna write "I love you"? You're so dumb~
25.english: Commander, I have something I want to tell you. I'm gonna write it on the back of your hand~ and done... Did you think I'm gonna write 'I like you'? Silly Commander~

26.chinese: 指挥官，你东西掉了~~啾~你掉了萨拉妹妹的芳心哟，还给你~
26.chineseTL: Commander, you dropped something~~ smooch~ You dropped Saratoga's maiden heart. Here, have it back~
26.japanese: 指揮官、落とし物よ～～チュッ♡…はい、サラトガちゃんの恋心、あげる～
26.japaneseTL: Commander, you dropped something~ (Kiss♡) That's right, you dropped my feelings for you. Here you go~
26.english: Commander, you dropped something~~ *kiss* ...Hehe, it was my heart♡. Here, you can keep it!

27.chinese: 啊指挥官，等一下哦，白鹰的航母姐妹们马上就要到了呢~欸？这种一生一次的场合当然要找人见证啦，萨拉妹妹可是白鹰的老将呢，很受尊重的哦！
27.chineseTL: Ah Commander, hold on for a bit. The carriers of the Eagle Union are about to arrive~ Eh? Of course we need people to witness this once in a lifetime occasion. Little Sara is a veteran of the Eagle Union. I'm highly respected, y'know!
27.japanese: ああ指揮官、ちょっと待ってて～ユニオンの姉妹たちそろそろここに集まるから～え？こうい一生に一度のものは立会人がいないと！サラトガちゃんこう見えてもユニオンでは老兵だから、みんなに尊敬されてるんだ！
27.japaneseTL: Ah, wait a sec, Commander~ The Union Sisters will be here in a second~ What? You need an audience for once-in-a-lifetime events like this! I may not look like it, but I'm a Union veteran! Everyone's got respect for me!
27.english: Ah, Commander. Please wait for a bit~ The Eagle Union carriers are all gathering~ Eh? This is a once in a lifetime occassion! Despite my appearance I am a veteran. I'm well respected!

28.japanese: 禁忌のダブルレキシントン！

29.chinese: 可爱的萨拉才不是老伙计
29.chineseTL: The cute Sara isn't an old timer.
29.japanese: このかわいいサラトガに「オールドブラザー」とかないわ～
29.japaneseTL: Cute little me won't be replaced by this "Old Brother" here~

30.chinese: 为什么你们发育这么好啊！
30.chineseTL: Why did you girls develop so well!
30.japanese: 何でみんなよく育ってるのよー！？
30.japaneseTL: How come everyone else grew up so much?!
30.english: Why do you all look so much more mature than me?!

31.japanese: 行こう！ビッグニュースを作ってみよう！
31.japaneseTL: Let's go and make some headlines!

32.chinese: 加加的芳心巧克力，送给指挥官♪今后也要一直喜欢加加哟~
32.chineseTL: Sara's maiden chocolate, I'm giving it to the Commander♪ Please keep liking Sara in the future~
32.japanese: サラトガちゃんの恋心チョコ、指揮官にあげる♪ずっとずっとサラトガちゃんを好きでいてね〜
32.japaneseTL: Saratoga's love-filled chocolate, from me to you, Commander♪ Please love me forever and ever~
32.english: Here, Commander, you get Sara's Pure Love chocolate♪ Promise you'll love me forever and ever~

33.chinese: 快收下萨拉妹妹的情人节巧克力吧~呵呵呵，要不我也试试开辟新路线……我还没来得及贯彻小魔女路线呢！指挥官，今年也请支持萨拉托加妹妹哦！
33.chineseTL: Quickly accept Sister Sara's Valentine Chocolate~ Hehehe, or else I will try open a new route... just kidding the Little Witch route hasn't been implemented yet! Commander, please support Little Saratoga this year too!
33.japanese: シスターサラからのバレンタインチョコ、受け取って～ふふふ、私も新路線を…って、まだ魔女っ子路線を極めてないし！指揮官、今年もサラトガちゃんのことを応援してねー！

1.chinese: 是时候从姐姐的羽翼下独立了！萨拉妹妹的新路线，魔法少女·萨拉托加，正式出道！指挥官，记得帮我做宣传哦~
1.chineseTL: It's about time I become independent from my sister's wings! Little Sara has a new path. Magical Girl: Saratoga's formal debut! Commander, remember to help promote me too~
1.japanese: 「姉から独立して羽ばたき、いざシスター・サラの新路線――魔女っ子アイドルサラトガちゃん、ただいま正式デビューよ！」指揮官、あとは宣伝、よろしくね～
1.japaneseTL: Sister Sara's leaving the nest and going down a new path! I'm making my official debut as the magical girl idol Saratoga! I'm leaving all the advertising to you, Commander~

2.chinese: 咻~！指挥官，怎么样，我的飞机欢迎阵列~
2.chineseTL: Hey~! Commander, what do you think about the welcoming formation of my planes~
2.japanese: ヒュ～！指揮官どうかな？サラトガちゃんの航空隊による歓迎飛行は♪
2.japaneseTL: Whoosh~! Are you impressed? That was my air wing's salutation flight♪

3.chinese: 胜利pose和咒文可是魔法少女必备的东西~指挥官，来帮我一起想想
3.chineseTL: Victory poses and incantations are a magical girl's necessities~ Commander, come help think of something with me.
3.japanese: 勝利のポーズと魔法の呪文は魔女っ子には必要不可欠！指揮官、サラトガちゃんと一緒に考えて♪
3.japaneseTL: A magical girl absolutely needs a pose and a spell for when she wins! Help me come up with one, Commander♪

4.chinese: 指挥官，你觉得让我的那些后辈们穿上魔法少女服会怎么样？嘻嘻嘻
4.chineseTL: Commander, what do you think about having my juniors wear magical girl costumes? hehehe
4.japanese: 指揮官、私の後輩たちにも魔女っ子っぽい着せ替えするのはどうかな？へへへ～
4.japaneseTL: Commander, what do you say we dress my subordinates up like magical girls too? (Giggle)

5.chinese: 魔法少女萨拉托加的无敌咒文是：会有办法的，绝对没问题的！......怎么样？
5.chineseTL: Magical girl Saratoga's invincible incantation: There will definitely be a way, no problem!... How about it?
5.japanese: 魔女っ子アイドルサラトガちゃん、無敵マジック「ナントカナルゼッタイダイジョウブノープロブレム！」……どうかな？
5.japaneseTL: This is my unrivaled magical girl idol incantation: "Noproblem Atall Thingswillwork Out Itwill Befine!" What do you think?

6.chinese: 如果有姐妹能从萨拉妹妹这里获得一点笑容和活力，那就再好不过啦~
6.chineseTL: If little Sara can give the girls smiles and energy, that would be most ideal~!
6.japanese: サラトガちゃんがみんなに笑顔と元気をお届けできるようになればいいよね♪
6.japaneseTL: I hope I'll be able to make everyone smile and be happy♪

7.chinese: 指挥官，这把杖说不定......拿来敲人手感会很好？！让我试试吧~
7.chineseTL: Commander, could it be that... it feels good to hit people with this staff? Let me try~
7.japanese: 指揮官、この艤装で……人をコツンと叩いたらどうなっちゃうのかな！？ちょっと試させてよ～
7.japaneseTL: I wonder what would happen… if I'd hit someone with this staff! Let me give it a try~

8.chinese: 呜呜呜，萨拉妹妹要嫁不出去啦……
8.chineseTL: Uuuu, little Sara can no longer get married...
8.japanese: ううう、サラトガちゃんお嫁に行けなくなっちゃうよ～
8.japaneseTL: Sob… Now I won't be able to get married anymore~

9.chinese: 辛苦啦，外套什么的就挂飞机上吧~
9.chineseTL: Good work, just hang your coat on the planes.
9.japanese: お疲れ様～コートは艦載機に掛けといてね♪
9.japaneseTL: Good work~ Just leave your coat hanging on one of my planes♪

10.chinese: 请投可爱的萨拉妹妹一票，谢谢~
10.chineseTL: Please vote for the cute little Sara, thanks~
10.japanese: サラトガちゃんに清き一票をお願いしまーす！みんな、ありがと～♡
10.japaneseTL: Remember to vote for Saratoga! Thank you, everyone~♡

1.chinese: 即使度假也决不松懈，泳装齐整、准备万全！OK，出发！准备好见识Sis.Sara的厉害了吗？
1.chineseTL: Even on a vacation we can't be complacent. Swimsuit ready, everything set! OK, let's go! Are you ready to see the power of Sister Sara?
1.japanese: オフの日でも気を緩めない！ふう…水着よし、準備万端！出発！シスターサラの力、見せてあげる！
1.japaneseTL: Even on our days off we can't take it easy! (Exhales) Swimsuit ready! Preparations ready! Taking off! I'll show you how powerful Sister Sara is!
1.english: Even in a day off, I'm not loosening up! Phew... Swimsuit, check. All preparations complete! Launch time! I'll show you Sister Sara's power!

2.chinese: 指挥官，今天也一起去海边吧，我还想吃冰镇西瓜！
2.chineseTL: Commander, let's go to the sea again today. I still want to eat iced watermelon!
2.japanese: 指揮官、今日も海に行こうよ！私、冷たいスイカ食べたーい！
2.japaneseTL: Commander, let's go to the sea again! I want to eat some cold watermelon!
2.english: Commander, let's head to the beach today! I want to eat chilled watermelon!

3.chinese: 谢谢指挥官的胸膛，我已经稍微打起精神了。作为这里唯一的白鹰舰娘，我可不能一直消沉下去……萨拉托加，再出击！
3.chineseTL: Thanks to Commander's chest, I have slightly regained my energy. As the only Eagle Union representative, I can't keep being down... Saratoga, moving out again!
3.japanese: 指揮官…？さっきはありがとね、ユニオンの空母としてビーチバレーで負けたぐらいで落ち込んではいられないよね！……うん！サラトガ！再出撃！
3.japaneseTL: Commander…? Thanks for earlier. As a Union carrier, I can't feel down just for losing in beach volleyball! Right! Saratoga, sortieing again!
3.english: Commander...? Thank you for before. As an Eagle Union carrier, I shouldn't be feeling down after losing in beach volleyball! ...Yep! Saratoga, launching again!

4.chinese: 说到沙滩上的竞技项目，果然就是那个了吧！
4.chineseTL: When talking about beach sports, it has to be that of course!
4.japanese: 浜辺でやるスポーツといえば、やっぱりアレね！
4.japaneseTL: When you think about sports you play on the beach, obviously a certain ball sport comes to mind!
4.english: When you talk about a sport to play on the beach, it has to be this!

5.chinese: 指挥官，一起下来游泳吧，我可以借你泳圈
5.chineseTL: Commander, come swim with me. I can let you borrow my swim ring.
5.japanese: 指揮官、一緒に海に入らない？浮き輪貸してあげる！
5.japaneseTL: Commander, will you come into the sea with me? I'll lend you my inner tube!
5.english: Commander, how about we get into the sea? I'll borrow you my lifesaver!

6.chinese: 威、威尔士，抱起我是要干什么……变大了？是、是吗？果然，萨拉我也是有在发育的！
6.chineseTL: W-wales, what are you picking me up for... I've become bigger? R-really? Sara I, am growing too!
6.japanese: う、ウェールズ？なんでいきなり…お、大きくなった？そう？そうよね！サラトガちゃんはやっぱり大きくなってるのよね！
6.japaneseTL: W-Wales? What is this all of a sudden… I-I've gotten bigger? Yeah, that's right! I really am growing after all!
6.english: W-Wales? Why are you hugging me suddenly... I've grown 'bigger'? Really? That's right! I have grown bigger after all!

7.chinese: 彻、彻彻底底输了……咕，明明只是个驱逐舰……呜呜呜……姐姐也不在……指挥官，我可以在你怀里哭吗？
7.chineseTL: C-completely lost... Ugh, and it was against only a destroyer... Wah... Sister isn't here either... Commander, can I cry in your arms?
7.japanese: ビーチバレーで……く、駆逐艦に負けちゃった…お姉ちゃんいないし……指揮官、泣いていい…？
7.japaneseTL: We played beach volleyball… a-and we lost to the destroyers… And big sis wasn't there… Commander, can I cry for a bit…?
7.english: In beach volleyball... I-lost to destroyers... my sister isn't here... Commander, can I cry on your shoulder for a while?

8.chinese: 指挥官，萨拉托加赢了！快来看看，雄伟的总统山和塌陷得乱七八糟的清水寺！
8.chineseTL: Commander, Saratoga has won! Come check out the majestic Mount Rushmore and the collapsed Kiyomizu-dera!
8.japanese: サラトガちゃんは砂城作りじゃ負けないわ！指揮官、見てみて！こっちはサラトガちゃんの…あ、あっちのぼろぼろなのはあの子のだよ！へっへっへっー
8.japaneseTL: I won't let anyone beat me at making sand castles! Commander, look! This is mine… Oh, and that pitiable one belongs to her! Hehehee!
8.english: Commander! Saratoga won! Come and see! I beat Honolulu! She can't believe it!

9.chinese: 吃完冰激凌就去做任务吧~我也要开始准备晚上的焰火了
9.chineseTL: Let's do the mission after finishing this ice cream~ I should also start preparing for tonight's fireworks.
9.japanese: アイスクリーム食べて、ミッションでも行こう！私も夜の篝火を準備しておかなくっちゃ！
9.japaneseTL: Let's eat ice cream and get to the mission! I have to get ready for tonight's bonfire, too!
9.english: Eat the ice cream, and go complete the mission! I'll prepare a fireworks show for tonight!

10.chinese: 指挥官做完任务啦？我的排球训练也结束了，一起休息一会儿吧……呼~天气太热都没有恶作剧的心思了
10.chineseTL: Commander is done with the mission? My volleyball practice is also over, so let's take a break together... Whew~ With the weather so hot, I don't even feel like playing pranks.
10.japanese: 指揮官、ミッションはもう終わった？私もビーチバレーの練習で疲れたわーふぅー。暑くて暑くていたずらする余裕もなくなっちゃったよ…
10.japaneseTL: Commander, did you finish the mission already? I'm exhausted too because of the beach volleyball practice. (Exhales) It's so, so hot that I don't even have the energy to pull pranks…
10.english: Commander, are you done with the mission? I'm tired from volleyball practice as well. Phew... It's so hot I'm too worn to prank...

11.japanese: 戻った戻った〜ふは〜あつーい！
11.japaneseTL: And we're back~ Oooaahh, it's soooo hot!
11.english: We~ are back~ Phew~ it's so hot!

12.chinese: 委托组的姐妹们回来了~指挥官，天上的孩子们刚刚做好了冰激凌，你想吃什么口味的？
12.chineseTL: The girls on commission are back~ Commander, my children in the sky have just finished making ice cream. What flavor would you like?
12.japanese: 委託に出かけた娘たちが帰ってきたよ。艦載機の子たちがアイスを作ったわ。指揮官はシロップはどれにする？
12.japaneseTL: The girls that were out on a commission are back. My air wing made some ice cream, so what kind of syrup do you want, Commander?
12.english: The girls out for commission have returned. I made some shaved ice with my planes. Commander, want some syrup on top?

13.chinese: 等萨拉的舷号变成CV-60，一定要给那些皇家舰娘好看！
13.chineseTL: When Sara's hull number becomes CV-60, I'll definitely show up those Royal Navy characters!
13.japanese: サラトガちゃんがもう一度進化したら、ロイヤルの子たちには絶対いい目の見せてやるわ！
13.japaneseTL: If I evolve once more then I'll make those Royal Navy girls really pay for what they've done!
13.english: If I evolve once more, I'm gonna show the Royals what I'm made of!

14.chinese: 夏日的萨拉托加也完——完全全没有可乘之机！
14.chineseTL: Saratoga in the summer also has absolutely no openings to exploit at all!
14.japanese: 夏のサラトガちゃんも――隙はない、だよ☆
14.japaneseTL: Summer Saratoga has no weaknesses either☆
